name: Xanthaphobia
storyline:
The narrative unfolds as you return to your residence on March 18th, 1997, and make a spontaneous decision to embark on an exploratory adventure within an abandoned structure. As you delve deeper into the decaying edifice, an unexpected revelation emerges—a clandestine Government laboratory concealed beneath its timeworn facade, housing enigmatic relics of past experiments.

Your curiosity leads you to an antiquated portal, compelling you to step through its threshold, yet unbeknownst to you, this seemingly innocuous choice becomes a pivotal and irrevocable turning point in your existence. As the door seals shut behind you, you find yourself transported to an entirely new realm, one fraught with perilous monstrosities and imminent danger.

In this unforgiving domain, your survival hinges on your ability to ingeniously employ your environment and resources to navigate the harrowing challenges that await. Your journey is an epic struggle for escape from this nightmarish abyss.

Leverage the principles of physics to facilitate your escape.
summary: Xanthaphobia presents an immersive experience that blends elements of puzzles, mystery, and horror.
